Package connect4

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BoardPanel
    BoardPanel that contains needed graphics, buttons, and labels
    CompPlayer
    Computer player that acts like a human player but with strategy algorithms rather than inputs.
    Connect4
    Inherits JFrame and creates needed components of the game
    ControlPanel
    ControlPanel that contains needed buttons such as play, undo, and quit.
    Game
    Class that inherits Grid Class that contains game data, controls the game, and processes mouse event.
    GamePanel
    GamePanel that makes control panel and board panel
    Grid
    Stores game data and defines game operations that happen on the game board(not board panel)
    HumanPlayer
    Human player class that is a subclass of the player class.
    IntroPanel
    Class that makes IntroPanel that is the intro page of the game
    Location
    Location class is a class that contains info about the chip's location.
    Player
    Parent class of CompPlayer and HumanPlayer, defines common variables and methods
    Strategy
    Strategy class made with minimax algorithm that is used by the computer player.
